title: Trying War
description: Mac, Cad, Lycon and Hero return to the ruins of Troy to confront disaster. Once again the Herdsmen of Ida are caught in unfolding legend - facing monsters, murderers and the gods at war, in a desperate attempt to challenge what the fates have decreed.2nd Book in the Hero Trilogy by S.D Gentill.
author: S.D. Gentill
